short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to find Steam game deals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save money on Steam games using GameSave.

Go to a game's Steam page and open GameSave. If there are any, GameSave will list the deals associated with the game. It's as simple as that!

All deal data is sourced from Cheapshark API.

This is an open source project. See the official repository for more details:
https://github.com/jclanting/gamesave
